title: C++ Level 6 â€” Vectors (STL) & Dynamic Arrays
intro: This level focuses on std::vector as a dynamic array and introduces basic STL usage.
points: Understand the need for dynamic arrays compared to static arrays.
Declare and use std::vector<int> and other vector types.
Use push_back, size, and indexing with vectors.
Traverse vectors with range-based for loops.
Start thinking in terms of STL containers instead of raw arrays.
